Type.Name: AxisUse

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AxisUse extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: An enumeration describing the way in which a device axis (valuator) maps onto the predefined valuator types that Gtk# understands.
Docs.remarks: Documentation for this section has not yet been entered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.AxisUse Ignore = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype Gdk.AxisUse Last = int32(7)

Docs.summary: A constant equal to the numerically highest axis value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.AxisUse Pressure = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The axis is used for pressure information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.AxisUse Wheel = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The axis is used for wheel information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.AxisUse X = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The axis is used as the x axis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.AxisUse Xtilt = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The axis is used for x tilt information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.AxisUse Y = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The axis is used as the y axis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.AxisUse Ytilt = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The axis is used for y tilt information.
